welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Darien, where southern charm meets beautiful coastal landscapes. Get ready to experience our quaint town known for its historic landmarks, delicious seafood, and inviting community. We hope you have a wonderful stay and enjoy all that Darien has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport, where all domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as Southwest and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American and Volaris.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as United and Air Canada.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport is where all commercial flights arrive and depart.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at O'hare International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The international terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving all international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, shops, and lounges.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves flights to and from international destinations, with customs and immigration facilities available.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, with VIP services and amenities available.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chicago Lansing Municipal Airport, where all commercial flights operate from.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chicago Lansing Municipal Airport, used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Gary/Chicago International Airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling all cargo flights at Gary/Chicago International Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
